## SyncHook class

Synchronous Hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SyncHook<T, R = void> extends SyncTapHook<T, R> 
```

## Remarks

Invoke listener Synchronously and return nothing

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [call(args)](./hamon.synchook.call.md) |  | call listener with <code>...args</code> |
